snippet: The Federal Aviation Administration said the changes to the number of hourly flights at the airport would take effect at the end of October.
abstract: Federal Aviation Admin will ease limits on number of hourly flights in and out of Newark Liberty International Airport; change is aimed at generating competition and lower fares.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Aviation Administration said the changes to the number of hourly flights at the airport would take effect at the end of October.

headline.main: F.A.A. Lifts Restrictions on Flights at Newark
headline.print_headline: F.A.A. to Ease Flight Limits at Newark

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
